summary.span: Generates object context and entity classes (object layer code) from conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files.

span.span: Generates object context and entity classes (object layer code) from conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files.

summary.span: Starting with Entity Framework version 4, an ObjectContext class for a specific model contains properties of type that represent the model’s entity sets.

span.span: Starting with Entity Framework version 4, an ObjectContext class for a specific model contains properties of type that represent the model’s entity sets.
